action_declare_war.requires_actor_independence: no # You are able to declare war only on your overlord when being a vassal, this special case is handled in code instead.

action_offer_peace.is_listed: no # Peace offers are handled through the war overview.

_comments: # Disable against fallen empires for subjects.
# Can't be rivals with your overlord or their other subjects.
# Can't be rivals with your subjects.
